name: PKStoredValuePassProperties
desc: An object that represents the properties of a pass that contains a balance used for specific transactions, such as a transit pass or loyalty card.

items.name: init?(for: PKPass)
items.desc: Creates a stored-value pass properties object for the specified pass.

items.name: var balances: [PKStoredValuePassBalance]
items.desc: The amount available for transactions for a service represented by a stored-value pass.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date?
items.desc: The expiration date of a pass.

items.name: var isBlocked: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the pass issuer disabled a stored-value pass.
